channel.title: My Minecraft creations
channel.description:
This is what happens when wow goes down and Mojang/Notch implement actual useful outputs for redstone,
lava moat bridge before: http://i.imgur.com/f5De9.jpg after: http://i.imgur.com/y9qJn.jpg down below: http://i.imgur.com/ws6Fs.jpg pistons: http://i.imgur.com/3CJzo.jpg piston power: http://i.imgur.com/9FfXN.jpg xor gate: http://i.imgur.com/WwUqI.jpg facing back xor gate to piston power http://i.imgur.com/vC0MB.jpg
automatic farm ready: http://i.imgur.com/E6yQ2.jpg top: http://i.imgur.com/RWSB5.jpg farming: http://i.imgur.com/N3IRG.jpg done: http://i.imgur.com/BKP5h.jpg the goods: http://i.imgur.com/FqZBF.jpg fresh: http://i.imgur.com/E1ktq.jpg
Post yours, kgo.

item.title: My Minecraft creations
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“lawl_temp, post:9, topic:405283”]griefing spawn points is way more fun in garrys mod. i would freeze a huge cube at the spawn point then paint it invisible, only way to get out is to noclip but usually noclip is disabled on public servers

good times.[/quote]
Ahaha, here at D3vine youll get banned instantly

Read full topic

item.title: My Minecraft creations
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

griefing spawn points is way more fun in garrys mod. i would freeze a huge cube at the spawn point then paint it invisible, only way to get out is to noclip but usually noclip is disabled on public servers

good times.

Read full topic

item.title: My Minecraft creations
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

actually it’s the highest voted cracked server with highest population according to minecraftservers.net. it’s named kingscraft, and we were the first to ever grief the spawnpoint, since nobody every thought that the safezone could be compromised by creating a tall tower through a modified 5x5 space out of spawnzone without a height limit reaching into the spawnzone and using sand and lava to allow creation of such.

because i would be proud of myself by griefing a server with 2 people in it opposed to hundreds without a safezone in the spawn.

big server, yet they don’t have back-ups. close enough.

Read full topic

item.title: My Minecraft creations
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“DEFET, post:6, topic:405283”]i always lose in this game

swastika on classical
http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6217/loltst.png

i got some screenshots of me griefing another server’s spawnpoint, along with swastikas in the spawn. server needed to wipe everything. screenshots provided on laptop later[/quote]

You are so cool for greifing server’s spawnpoint, only the most skilled people can do that! Or wait, any moron with a computer can do that. Anyway, any decent server should be making regular backups and could probably just roll back all your actions at once.

Read full topic

item.title: My Minecraft creations
item.dc:creator: @eXemplar eXemplar
item.description:
@eXemplar wrote:

Frank worked on it longer than I did, it was mostly complete on the outside and walkways, but otherwise the innards were empty. Then Notch added npcs and creepers started blowing random holes in it.

Here’s a pic of the outside, all I could find: http://i.imgur.com/hj5VE.jpg

Read full topic
